attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: this app took so long for me to download just for it to crash any time I open it. I was able to get on a few times but then it would instantly take me to my home screen. I have no idea why its doing this and i see that a lot of people are having trouble. If this is a common issue WHY HAS IT NOT GOT FIXED. All the money this man has and he cant even fix his app. I hate it

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: So i download the app because I was like why not so you know when it finished downloading I was like okay good I can open the app but when I opened the app it said “sorry I hate to do this to you but your taillights are out”and wdym and then i went online to see what the problem was and it said that you must put on a white person for it to work they were right

attributes.title: it was an experience ✨
attributes.review: i got this app wanting to keep up with my favorite cheese puff president❤️💖😛🥰😃😌😎💛😘😝🦋👑✨😊 i just think it’s so cool that we would elect an incompetent orange man to run our country, it really shows what america is all about❤️ but when i downloaded the app, it just kinda spazzed out. like no lie it just flew all over my home page and i just couldn’t bring my thumb to click on the app and open it 😖😭😔😪 it was a traumatizing experience💔💔💔 to anyone who wants to get this app: don’t <3 and if you love donnie then get some help , just kidding u don’t need it hahahahaha ... that is all 100% a joke 😝😝 like take a joke guys hahahahah u thought i was serious wow um anyway i love america??

attributes.title: Hello Darkness my old friend... I’ve come to talk to you again
attributes.review: I opened the app to see about the updates on rallies and stuff and it glitches out! I think the big Cheeto mf just makes my phone scream. Not to mention, his spray tan is so uneven, his hair looks like the hair from an ear of corn, and he looks like a pig. And why is he so bitter for? Like he don’t care about nothing? Trump 2020? More like, Dump 2020 in the trash if he becomes president again. 🙂

Okay so I know there’s a lot of people who are only rating this app a 1 because they want this app to get removed, but I downloaded the app out of curiosity because I wanted to get information and updates on what Trump is doing. I regret downloading this app!!! Somehow all my apps got hacked right after downloading the app. I can’t recover any of my information on my apps. Random pictures got deleted. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP (;

attributes.title: Obama 2020
attributes.review: I didn’t get this app because of something I saw on tiktok but really this app ruined all of my stuff and it wouldn’t let me get in to any apps and It wasn’t doing this before I saw someone else with this Same problem and I have the same problem and it took up most of my storage please do something about this or just take the app down thank you! P.S yes I did this bc I saw it on tiktok haha

attributes.title: The duck that had 6 kids and 90 abortion
attributes.review: i got this app because i’m pregnant and me and my 5 kids (now 6) we were very hungry and we saw an orange in the cover so we bought it to see every every oranges but turns out it’s about the President of the United States. The reason I deleted the app is because I do not like the president is because he’s in a bad TickTock and I’m super bored and only thing I have to watch a TikTok so

attributes.title: oof
attributes.review:
so i was walking across the street to meet my love damon salavatore. when all the sudden my phone starts blowing up because of this 🎃 2020 app thing. and then i end up in narnia because i opened the notifications. i this app is terrible. why didn’t it take me to the dang bahamas. why 
narnia. but i opened my eyes and i was in a hospital. with the great gastby right next to me. he said that i opened the wrong app and i was hit with an orange and put in a coma. i asked what app and he said the trump 2020 app. this app is the reason i was hit with an kiwi and dropped in a hole with penny wise. so in conclusion to avoid getting hit with donkeys and being put in an out house. do not download this app!

attributes.title: Had high hopes 👁👄👁
attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app I was like make America great again, just kidding. Worst app in the history of apps. I clicked on the app and saw this creature. I didn’t know what it was. I have never seen something so, what’s the word, ugly. I clicked off right away. Then I deleted the app. I know you should too. Then you should then right a 1 ⭐️ review like everyone else. Sincerely the best generation!

attributes.title: 🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: Horrible, u stupid orange give us our tiktok back or i stg gen Z will be the end of you. The app directions were unclear now my dik it stuck in my hydroflask. And I got ran over by a corncob, my ankle is broken so your paying for my dentist bill😡The trees were growing purple once I signed in so i would say sexual harassment notifications are a no no momo. All in all i do not recommend this app😌have fun trying to get sponsored now
